abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column on John Gagliardi, St John's football coach who has won 482 games in a career that covers more than six decades; notes that while Joe Paterno of Penn State stands alone among Division 1 football coaches with 409 victories, it is unlikely he will surpass Gagliardi's record.
snippet: With a 47-14 victory over Carleton College on Saturday, John Gagliardi of St. John’s University in Minnesota has won 482 games in a head-coaching career that covers more than six decades.
lead_paragraph: With a 47-14 victory over Carleton College on Saturday, John Gagliardi of St. John’s University in Minnesota has won 482 games in a head-coaching career that covers more than six decades.

headline.main: 409 Wins? The Coach Who Has Paterno Beat
headline.print_headline: 409 Victories? The Coach Who Has Paterno Beat
